title: Administrative Professional - Short Form
description: The Administrative Professional solution is for entry to mid-level positions that involve routine clerical and administrative functions in addition to office management functions and customer service.

title: Agency Manager Solution
description: The Agency Manager solution is for mid-level sales management positions that include front-line management and sales responsibilities, such as directing and coordinating financial activities.

title: Apprentice + 8.0 Job Focused Assessment
description: A short, globally applicable assessment for entry-level positions, particularly appropriate for countries and industries that use an apprenticeship model. Includes a short cognitive ability measure.

title: Bank Administrative Assistant - Short Form
description: Designed for entry-level clerical positions that interact with external or internal customers. Tasks include answering phones, managing files, sorting mail, and greeting customers.

title: JavaScript Programming Test
description: Assesses proficiency in JavaScript programming, including functions, objects, DOM manipulation, and modern ES6+ features.

title: Leadership Assessment
description: Evaluates leadership potential, decision-making skills, and ability to motivate and direct teams.

title: Customer Service - Short Form
description: Tests customer service skills like communication, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills for entry-level roles.

title: Financial Professional - Short Form
description: Designed for financial roles, assessing skills in financial analysis, accuracy, and decision-making.

title: Cashier Solution
description: The Cashier solution assesses skills for handling payments, customer service, and issuing receipts/refunds for retail positions.

title: Contact Center Customer Service + 8.0
description: Designed for customer service roles in contact centers, this assessment evaluates communication, problem-solving, and customer interaction skills.

title: Graduate + 8.0 Job-Focused Assessment
description: A tailored assessment for graduate-level candidates evaluating cognitive abilities, adaptability, and problem-solving skills.

title: Bilingual Spanish Reservation Agent Solution
description: Designed for bilingual customer service roles in the hospitality industry, focusing on reservation handling and customer interaction in English and Spanish.

title: Healthcare Call Center Agent Solution
description: Assessment designed for healthcare call center roles, evaluating skills in patient interaction, data entry, and problem-solving.

title: Bookkeeping, Accounting, Auditing Clerk Short Form
description: This solution assesses skills for entry-level roles in bookkeeping, accounting, and auditing, including data entry, financial accuracy, and record-keeping.

title: Branch Manager - Short Form
description: Designed for managerial positions in financial institutions, assessing leadership, management judgment, and problem-solving.

title: Director - Short Form
description: Assesses skills for director-level roles, including strategic planning, leadership, and decision-making.

title: Event Sales Manager Solution
description: Evaluates skills for managing sales events, including planning, coordination, and client interaction.

title: Graduate 7.1 Job Focused Assessment
description: Assessment for graduate candidates, focusing on analytical thinking, problem-solving, and adaptability in professional environments.

title: Home Health Aide Solution
description: Evaluates skills for home health aide roles, focusing on patient care, communication, and problem-solving.

title: Industrial - Entry Level 7.0 Solution
description: Assessment for entry-level industrial roles, focusing on mechanical aptitude, safety awareness, and teamwork.

title: Sales Representative Solution
description: Designed for sales roles, evaluating persuasion, negotiation, and customer relationship skills.

title: Customer Service with Sales - Short Form
description: Tests customer service and sales skills for entry-level roles, including communication, problem-solving, and upselling.

title: Installation and Repair Technician Solution
description: Assesses skills for installation and repair roles, focusing on technical knowledge, problem-solving, and customer interaction.

title: Gaming Manager Solution
description: Evaluates skills for managing gaming facilities, including staff management, customer service, and operational efficiency.
